title: UPDATE 1-UK's Kier says on track for double-digit profit growth in 2018
text: March 15, 2018 / 7:57 AM / Updated 31 minutes ago UPDATE 1-UK's Kier says on track for double-digit profit growth in 2018 Reuters Staff 2 Min Read (Adds details) March 15 (Reuters) - Britain’s Kier Group on Thursday said it was on track to deliver double-digit profit growth in 2018, helped by a strong order book at its construction and services business. The company, whose activities range from building power stations to outsourcing work for local councils, said pipeline conversion was strong in construction and services business. The construction and support services company posted an underlying operating profit of 60 million pounds ($83.86 million) in the six months ended Dec. 31, up from 57.3 million pounds a year earlier. Underlying revenue rose 7.6 percent to 2.15 billion pounds. Helped by demand in its regional building and highway services businesses, the company said its order book grew to 9.5 billion pounds in the six months to Dec. 31, from 8.9 billion at June-end. “We remain on course to deliver double-digit profit growth in 2018 and to achieve our Vision 2020 strategic targets,” the company said. ($1 = 0.7155 pounds) (Reporting by Radhika Rukmangadhan in Bengaluru; Editing by Sunil Nair and Vyas Mohan)
